analgesics.name: Aspirin
analgesics.description: Aspirin is a medication used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation.
analgesics.howToUse: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed for pain. Do not exceed 12 tablets in 24 hours.

analgesics.name: Ibuprofen
analgesics.description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever, pain, and inflammation.
analgesics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet every 6-8 hours with food to reduce the risk of stomach upset.

analgesics.name: Codeine
analgesics.description: A prescription opioid analgesic used for moderate to severe pain relief. Often combined with paracetamol or ibuprofen.
analgesics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 240 mg in 24 hours. Use under medical supervision due to risk of dependence.

analgesics.name: Diclofenac
analgesics.description: A NSAID used for pain and inflammation in conditions like arthritis, migraines, and muscle injuries.
analgesics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet (50 mg) two to three times a day with food. For gels, apply a thin layer to the affected area up to 3 times daily.

analgesics.name: Naproxen
analgesics.description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for treating pain, inflammation, and stiffness caused by conditions like arthritis and menstrual cramps.
analgesics.howToUse: ake 1 tablet every 8-12 hours with food or milk to prevent stomach upset. Do not exceed 1250 mg per day unless prescribed by a doctor.

analgesics.name: Paracetamol
analgesics.description: Used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain
analgesics.howToUse: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed.

antibiotics.name: Amoxicillin
antibiotics.description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet every 12 hours for 7-10 days, as prescribed by your doctor.

antibiotics.name: Ciprofloxacin
antibiotics.description: A fluoroquinolone antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as UTIs, skin infections, and respiratory infections.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet every 12 hours (twice daily) with water. Avoid taking with dairy products or antacids. Continue the course for 5â€“14 days as prescribed.

antibiotics.name: Azithromycin
antibiotics.description: A macrolide antibiotic effective against respiratory infections, skin infections, and sexually transmitted infections like chlamydia.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 500 mg on the first day, followed by 250 mg once daily for the next 4 days. Take on an empty stomach or after a light meal..

antibiotics.name: Doxycycline
antibiotics.description: A tetracycline antibiotic used to treat acne, respiratory infections, malaria prevention, and bacterial infections such as Lyme disease.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 1 capsule twice daily with food and a full glass of water to avoid stomach irritation. Do not lie down for at least 30 minutes after taking.

antibiotics.name: Clindamycin
antibiotics.description: Treats skin, bone, and soft tissue infections.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 1 capsule every 6 hours with a full glass of water.

antibiotics.name: Penicillin
antibiotics.description: Treats strep throat, syphilis, and dental infections.
antibiotics.howToUse: Take 1 tablet every 6-8 hours. Complete the full course.

antidepressants.name: Fluoxetine
antidepressants.description: Fluoxetine is an antidepressant used to treat depression, anxiety, and certain other conditions.
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 tablet once a day in the morning. Do not stop taking without consulting your doctor.

antidepressants.name: Sertraline
antidepressants.description: For depression, anxiety, PTSD, and OCD.
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily in the morning or evening, as prescribed.

antidepressants.name: Escitalopram
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily, usually in the morning.

antidepressants.name: Citalopram
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 tablet once daily with or without food.

antidepressants.name: Duloxetine
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 capsule daily. Swallow whole; do not crush or chew.

antidepressants.name: Bupropion
antidepressants.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily for 3 days, then twice daily. Avoid taking at night.

antihistamines.name: Cetirizine
antihistamines.description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms like runny nose and sneezing.
antihistamines.howToUse: Take 1 tablet once a day. Do not exceed 1 tablet in 24 hours.

antihistamines.name: Loratadine
antihistamines.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily. Safe for long-term use.

antihistamines.name: Diphenhydramine
antihistamines.description: For allergy symptoms, motion sickness, and insomnia.
antihistamines.howToUse: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours. May cause drowsiness..

antihistamines.name: Fexofenadine
antihistamines.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily or 60 mg twice daily. Avoid fruit juices.

antihypertensives.name: Amlodipine
antihypertensives.description: For high blood pressure and chest pain.
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily with or without food.

antihypertensives.name: Losartan
antihypertensives.description: For hypertension and kidney protection in diabetes.
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily with or without food..

antihypertensives.name: Metoprolol
antihypertensives.description: For blood pressure and heart issues.
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1-2 tablets daily with food. Avoid sudden discontinuation.

antihypertensives.name: Lisinopril
antihypertensives.description: Lisinopril is used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1 tablet once a day, with or without food. Follow your doctor's dosage recommendations.

antihypertensives.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
antihypertensives.description: For reducing blood pressure and fluid retention.
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily in the morning to avoid nighttime urination.

antihypertensives.name: Enalapril
antihypertensives.howToUse: Take 1 tablet daily on an empty stomach for best results.
